page.title: 03EDUCATION IN ERPINGHAM
page.content: {EDUCATION Children attend Erpingham V.C.Primary School(4-11yrs)and go to Aylsham High School (11-16yrs)before attnding a 6th form college if successful in their exams.ERP.sch.hrs.9-15.15 daily. {PRIMARY SCHOOL NUMBER ON ROLL=56 class 1--20 ch.(4-7yrs) teacher MRS ULYATT class2 16 ch. (7-9) MRS SURRIDGE and MRS TREE CLASS 3 20 ch.(9-11)MR BARRETT B.A.(HEAD) {CURRICULUM Approx.25%language 20%maths 15%env studies 10%science 10%craft/art 10%physical ed. 5%music 5%relig.ed. {BUILDING BUILT 1862 .2 CLASSROOMS+MOBILE.
